snippet: Navy Cmdr. Jose Luis Sanchez, 41, was arrested in Tampa and was also charged with accepting $100,000 from an Asian ship-servicing company that overbilled the Navy.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say that Navy Cmdr Jose Luis Sanchez has been arrested on charges of accepting prostitutes and luxury travel from Glenn Defense Marine Asia, Asian ship-servicing company that overbilled the Navy by millions of dollar; Sanchez is the third Navy official to have been arrested in the case.
lead_paragraph: Navy Cmdr. Jose Luis Sanchez, 41, was arrested in Tampa and was also charged with accepting $100,000 from an Asian ship-servicing company that overbilled the Navy.

headline.main: A Third Navy Official Is Arrested in Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: A Third Navy Official Is Arrested In Bribery Case

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
